channel.title: Flask on Ashwani Kumar
channel.description: Recent content in Flask on Ashwani Kumar

item.title: Creating Website using Flask
item.description: Today I’m going to walk you through a tutorial on creating a simple web app using Flask. For those who are new to term Flask: Flask is a Python Framework for creating web application Has a simple syntax and is very easy to use Has a built in development server and debugger Uses Jinja2 templating You can read more about it on it’s website http://flask.pocoo.org/ First Thing First :- Before moving further we need some packages and of course Python to get started.
